match.schema:
description: "combo_order_settings"
type: object
required:
  - enabled
  - price_coeff
  - available_categories
properties:
  enabled:
    type: boolean
  price_coeff:
    type: number
    minimum: 0.0
    exclusiveMinimum: true
    maximum: 1.0
    exclusiveMaximum: true
  available_categories:
    type: array
    items:
      type: string
additionalProperties: false

description: "combo_inner_outer_settings"
type: object
required:
  - enabled
  - inner_coeff
  - outer_coeff
  - available_categories
properties:
  enabled:
    type: boolean
  inner_coeff:
    type: number
    minimum: 0.0
    exclusiveMinimum: true
    maximum: 1.0
    exclusiveMaximum: true
  outer_coeff:
    type: number
    minimum: 0.0
    exclusiveMinimum: true
    maximum: 1.0
    exclusiveMaximum: true
  available_categories:
    type: array
    items:
      type: string
additionalProperties: false

description: "combo_settings"
type: object
required:
  - enabled
  - available_categories
properties:
  enabled:
    type: boolean
  available_categories:
    type: array
    items:
      type: string
additionalProperties: false
